notes:
Has a high armor value.
Appeared during [[Tibia's 15th Anniversary|Tibia's 15th]] and [[Tibia's 20th Anniversary|20th Anniversary]] celebrations, in a raid at a random time once a day.
The following message will appear:
{{Server Message|A strange ghost has appeared somewhere in the deepling area. This calls for an experienced ghost hunter!}}
Then, 20 minutes later he will spawns:
{{Server Message|The terrifying ghost Lagatos has appeared in the deepling area - and Lionet is out to hunt it!}}

{{Server Message|The terrifying ghost Lagatos has appeared in the deepling area - and Lionet, Sinclar and Spectulus are out to hunt it!}}
name: Lionet (Creature)
location: On [[Fiehonja]], south of the statue of Qjell ({{Mapper Coords|130.167|122.76|14|4|text=here}}).

Try to separate Lionet from the other NPC's, as Sinclair and Spectulus cannot be killed.
